title: Entity Permissions
description: The permission a User has for a given Entity

canView.description: Can the user view this entity?

canEdit.description: Can the user edit this entity?  Note:  If the user is not a certified user then although this returns true, the user may not be able to edit the entity.

canAddChild.description: Can the user add a child entity to this entity?  Note:  If the user is not a certified user then although this returns true, the user may not be able to edit the entity.

canChangePermissions.description: Can the user change the permissions of this entity?

canDelete.description: Can the user delete this entity?

canDownload.description: Can the user download this entity?

canUpload.description: Can the user upload into this entity (folder or project)?

canEnableInheritance.description: Can the user delete the entity's access control list (so it inherits settings from an ancestor)?

ownerPrincipalId.description: The principal ID of the entity's owner (i.e. the entity's 'createdBy')
